An attributed string representation of `value`, formatted according to the style’s configuration. # format(_:)

**Instance Method**

Formats a decimal value, using this style.

## Declaration

```swift
func format(_ value: Decimal) -> AttributedString
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The decimal value to format.

## Return Value

An attributed string representation of `value`, formatted according to the style’s configuration. The returned string contains attributes from the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/FoundationAttributes/NumberFormatAttributes] attribute scope to indicate runs formatted by this format style.
title: format(_:)
